dataset.select: SELECT id, name, registration_num, class, owner, description FROM boat WHERE (class = {{boat_class}) OR (NULLIF ({{boat_class}}, '') IS NULL) ORDER BY name;
dataset.update: UPDATE boat SET name = {{name}}, registration_num = {{registration_num}}, class = {{class}}, owner = {{owner}}, description = {{description}}, change_user = {{__username}}, change_date = datetime ('now') WHERE id = {{id}};
